price: 54. Kuwaas waxaa la siin ajarkooda labo jeer samirkoodii darti, waxayna ku qaabilaan wixii xumaan ah samaan, waxaan ku irsaaqnona wax ka bixiyaan.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُؤۡتَوۡنَ أَجۡرَهُم مَّرَّتَيۡنِ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيَدۡرَءُونَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimā ṣabarū wayadraūna bil-ḥasanati al-sayi-ata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
